meanings.definition: Not conforming to the standards expected in a particular profession.
meanings.sent1: She was unprofessionally dressed for the job interview.
meanings.sent2: The unprofessionally written report had many errors.
meanings.sent3: Even the clown at the circus would not dress unprofessionally.
meanings.sent4: His unprofessionally painted artwork lacked finesse.
meanings.sent5: The unprofessionally built house collapsed in the storm.

meanings.definition: In a manner that does not meet the standards of professionalism.
meanings.sent1: He behaved unprofessionally during the important meeting.
meanings.sent2: The employee spoke unprofessionally to the customer.
meanings.sent3: The magician unprofessionally revealed his tricks to the audience.
meanings.sent4: The singer unprofessionally forgot the lyrics during the concert.
meanings.sent5: The chef unprofessionally burned the dish and had to start over.
